scout.soldier_dominationscout02: How's that domination feel, city boy?
scout.soldier_dominationscout03: You kids today don't know how to dominate.
scout.soldier_dominationscout05: You cannot run from me, my gun is faster.
scout.soldier_dominationscout06: You run fast, my bullets run faster.
scout.soldier_dominationscout07: Never bring a bat to a battlefield, war is not a game.
scout.soldier_dominationscout08: Your mouth wrote checks, my gun has cashed them.
scout.soldier_dominationscout09: Got anything funny to say about that, funny man?
scout.soldier_dominationscout10: Never send a boy to fight a man's war.
scout.soldier_dominationscout11: You were in a big fat hurry to die, son.

soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier02: You better hope there's hacky-sack in Hell, hippie!
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier03: You are now a conscientious objector to being dead, hippie!
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier04: What's the matter, hippie? Hair get in your eyes?
soldier.soldier_dominationsoldier06: You're a disgrace to the uniform.

pyro.soldier_dominationpyro01: I just tore you a new chimney, Smokey Joe!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro02: You cannot burn me, I'm already on fire!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro03: You cannot burn me! I'm already ablaze with passion, for war!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro04: You cannot burn me! I do not have time to combust!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro05: Fire is for cookin' s'mores, son. Get a real gun.
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro06: Your fire-retardant ass just got dominated.
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro07: Ha! Ya fight like a girl!
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro08: How do you like that, All Quiet on the Western Front?
pyro.soldier_dominationpyro09: Get a haircut, hippie! [whispered] Just in case.

demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman02: Consider yourself dominated, you Scotch son of a bitch!
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman04: I love your death, cyclops; your death is sweet to me like love is sweet.
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman05: Scotland is not a real country; you are an Englishman with a dress.
demoman.soldier_dominationdemoman06: You're like the Cyclops of Greek myth; except you are Scottish, and I hate you!

heavy.soldier_dominationheavy02: Stars and Stripes beats Hammer and Sickle. Look it up!
heavy.soldier_dominationheavy05: Go play your pinko chess game with the Devil, Commie!
heavy.soldier_dominationheavy06: This American boot just kicked your ass back to Russia!

engineer.soldier_dominationengineer03: Stop hiding behind your little toys and fight like a man!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer04: I will eat your ribs, I will eat them up!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer05: That's where books get you, professor!
engineer.soldier_dominationengineer06: Go back to Calgary, ya cow-herdin' Canadian!

medic.soldier_dominationmedic04: Ich bin I just kicked your ass!
medic.soldier_dominationmedic05: Welcome to the United States of YOU JUST GOT DOMINATED!
medic.soldier_dominationmedic06: I'm gonna mail my boot to the Kaiser with your ass around it!

sniper.soldier_dominationsniper01: This is not a camping trip, Sheila; this is war and I love it!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper02: You will not turn my battlefield into a campground.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper03: Now hear this, camper, you are not wanted on my beloved battlefield!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper04: I will send my condolences to your kangaroo wife.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper05: You are a coward, and you died like one.
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper06: The next time you want to kill a man, look him in the eyes!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper07: You just got dominated, Bilbo Baggins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper08: You just got dominated, Balbo Biggins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper09: You just got dominated, Bablo Bravins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper10: You just got dominated, Barble Bapkins!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper11: You just got dominated, Bazbo Bibbons!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper12: Aww, am I too violent for you, cupcake?
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper13: Your country did not prepare you for the level of violence you will meet on my battlefield!
sniper.soldier_dominationsniper14: You just got dominated, Bulbo Buttons!

spy.soldier_dominationspy02: You just got your Frenchie ass dominated.
spy.soldier_dominationspy06: Your white flag does not stop American bullets.
spy.soldier_dominationspy07: Words cannot express how much I hate France right now!

offense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackoffense01: Do not let that cart roll back!
offense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackoffense02: The cart needs to go forward!

offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense03: I do not see enough pushing!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense10: Ladies, let's get this cart moving!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense11: You will push this cart or I will push you into a grave!
offense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwardoffense12: We will push until there is nothing left to push!

offense/stayclose.soldier_cartstaycloseoffense05: Stick to that cart like glue, that is an order!
offense/stayclose.soldier_cartstaycloseoffense06: Get to the cart! Hup, hup, hup!

offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense01: Why is that cart stopped, maggots?!
offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense02: I do not see a cart moving, ladies!
offense/stopped.soldier_cartstoppedoffense03: Why is that cart not moving?!

defense/goingback.soldier_cartgoingbackdefense02: That's it, men, move that cart back!

defense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwarddefense01: Do not let that cart go forward!
defense/goingforward.soldier_cartgoingforwarddefense02: Hold the line, men! Stop that cart!

defense/stopit.soldier_cartstopitdefense01: Stand next to the cart, damn you!
defense/stopit.soldier_cartstopitdefense03: You will stand next to that cart or I will stand you next to that cart!
